title: My Account : IGotRektNG Got Banned , During The 14 days Ban. Is that Normal to Happen?
body:

All Normal , But when I came In I was Perma Banned , During That time I wasn't Playing 

I am Talking To League OF Legends Assistants : But They Deny Or Dont Tell me The data Or day Of The 14 Day Ban Witch Is Crucial To Prove This , Anyways I Got a print Who can Prove It .

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.
You were given a 14-day ban while you were in game. But, you then got banned for your behavior in THAT game as well.
I gotta be honest, unless the offenses are *really* severe I think that's kind of unfair. The 14 day ban is a step in reform, but when it hits like that there's no opportunity to learn from it.

My Offenses Weren't severe , Like i got Perma Ban Because in the whole Game i only said bitch  and it was because i was frutated because they killed me when i was with lag is it normal to be ban like that

Just remember to take this time to sort out whatever real life issues are causing your toxicity. I hope to see a reformed player out of you so that you may continue to play. Lag is frustrating but remember to not take it out on your teammates since they were not responsible. If lag is causing you to rage because it's unfair that you're lagging, try to adjust your graphics settings or get better service to eliminate the lag. I myself throw temper tantrums at inanimate objects like computers and intangible objects like my Internet service. Just keep it out of game chat. Good luck to you and remember, if you ever get frustrated, you can come here and let loose some frustration as long as you keep it constructive. Cheers!
thx alot sir , i really aprecciate what you're doing , really thanks !
That is really unfair....
I didn't Get it , I Can Get two Bans in the same game???

Different games.

You played a game (game 1), you were toxic.
You get into another game (game 2).
You got banned for (game 1) while you were playing (game 2)
You were toxic in (game 2)
You got banned for (game 2)
Is that Normal to Happen? Shouldn't I have Been Instant Ban ?

Write in to player support. They will review the case and see if they can do anything for you if you don't have a really long/bad history.

I hope my summary helped explain what happened for you. You should put the summary I gave you into your player support ticket. It will likely help them sort it out.

EDIT: 
Actually, I'm out of coffee so I have a few minutes to sort it out for you (never work without coffee). I've reduced it to a 14-day for you, because you didn't really have a chance to learn from your 14-day ban. But, remember the next penalty will be a permanent account ban.
ok , thx for you're time
You're very welcome. Happy to help sort it out.
Can we ban them for Capitalizing Almost Every Word In The Sentence?

(This is totally off topic, but why is your title "senior software engineer" when you appear to be someone with authority over bans/punishment stuff? I'd think that'd be 'senior player behaviour specialist' or something along those lines, rather than software related.)

Some light reading, if you're interested
https://engineering.riotgames.com/news/debugging-titles-part-i
https://engineering.riotgames.com/news/debugging-titles-part-ii
https://engineering.riotgames.com/news/debugging-titles-part-iii

I'm a senior software engineer, that's correct in terms of my title and discipline.
On top of titles, we also have roles.

One role I have is being the tech lead for the Player Behavior team.

What does this mean? I draw lots of boxes and arrows,  and lay out the architecture etc for all of the player behavior systems. 

As such, I have a good idea of how all of the systems work:).

I hope that helps!

Interesting.

I feel like I'm broadly missing out on a lot of interesting articles from the engineering side of riot games since those don't reach the main news posts, and manually checking is one more thing on an already long list of 'oh I should check X more often'.
Again , thanks alot for helping me sir
i really aprecciate it

As far as I'm aware, he works on the systems that govern player behavior, but isn't actually on the player behavior team. The teams work closely together, but are separate entities, nonetheless.

The Player Behavior team works more with the policies that should be implemented to reduce player-to-player negativity, while software engineers have a pretty wide scope as to what they're responsible for (but at the end of the day, implementing systems).

Oh dear.
 What the riot employee is saying is that while you were playing a game you got flagged to be reviewed and were banned for 2 weeks during a game which you were allowed to finished before your ban started.

 While in that game which was your last you were again toxic enough to be found guilty again and it escalated your ban.

 Sucks you were permanently banned but it sounds like you need to stop playing for a while to cool down and then play again.
While you sound like a pretty crappy person to play with, I have to say it doesn't really seem fair that you weren't able to go through your suspension and have a chance at reforming one last time.

It could be one of two reasons.

You might have received a manual review that escalated the ban while the 14-day ban was taking place.

Or you were perma-banned for a different reason, such as suspected scripting or a suspected account compromise.

You should have received an email saying what day you were assigned bans in either case.
